article_title: Suspects named in deadly Tel Aviv shooting and knife attack.
sentence: Israeli  authorities  have  released  more  details  about  the  deadly  stabbing  and  shooting  attack  in  Tel  Aviv  on  Tuesday,  which  happened  as  Iran  was  carrying  out  its  massive  missile  attack.

article_title: Suspects named in deadly Tel Aviv shooting and knife attack.
sentence: Israeli  authorities  have  released  more  details  about  the  deadly  stabbing  and  shooting  attack  in  Tel  Aviv  on  Tuesday,  which  happened  as  Iran  was  carrying  out  its  massive  missile  attack.

article_title: Suspects named in deadly Tel Aviv shooting and knife attack.
sentence: In  a  joint  statement,  the  Israeli  police  and  the  Shin  Bet  security  service  said  seven  Israelis  were  killed  and  another  16  injured.

article_title: Suspects named in deadly Tel Aviv shooting and knife attack.
sentence: The  joint  Israel  Police  and  Shin  Bet  investigation  revealed  that  the  terrorists  were  19-year-old  Muhammad  Mask,  who  was  killed  at  the  scene,  and  25-year-old  Ahmad  Haymani,  who  was  critically  wounded.
